name: incarcerate
content:

formal to put or keep someone in prison or in a place used as a prison: Thousands of dissidents have been interrogated or incarcerated.
to keep someone in a closed place and prevent them from leaving it: be incarcerated in We were incarcerated in that broken elevator for four hours.
